page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In our playground we play lots of games.Here are some chasing games, Bulldog, Tig and Turkey Lurkey. To play turkey lurkey you need 3 or more people and a post. One person is on, and whilst they count the other people run and hide. The one on finds the other players and when they're found they run to the post and say "Turkey Lurkey seen" then say their name. We play lots of skipping games. Ball games are also popular such as football, catch, get the ball and Queenie Queenie, Piggy in the Middle and Hot Rice. To play this game you just have to dodge the ball. If it hits you under the knee you are out.Another game played is marbles, you have a marble and try to hit someone elses with yours or you try to hit a target on a drain grate.
